attributes.action: grant a uk award to Joe Longthorne [this is follow up to petition delivered by hand to Tony Blair 2 years ago]
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many people have  been nominating joe longthorne to receive an award from the british public - a hand delivered petition was delivered to no 10 approx two years ago, since then letters, forms etc., have been submitted but to no avail. Please can this nominee be followed up - i am sending further documentation via land post - on behalf of thousands of joe longthorne followers in respect of his on going charity works 30 years or more- and his 30 year fight cancer / leukaemia throughout that time he has incessantly worked for charities to help sufferers and their families with this disease.
WHY ARE WE THE BRITISH PUBLIC BEING IGNORED IN THIS REQUEST. Action please.
